Posts.Content: Hi, are you on Filgrastim injections? I have completed 3 rounds of ec and just moving on to taxol, my back and knee joints were very painful on day 8/9 but this is due to the injections, your bone marrow is working hard to produce white blood cells, my oncologist said this is a good thing, they’re doing there job Good luck Â  Terri x
Posts.Title: EC chemo - back pain
